title: Featured Notebooks
description: These notebooks from the Julia community show off what you can do with Pluto. Give it a try, you might learn something new!

collections.title: Getting started
collections.description: Learn the basics of Pluto in just 10 minutes!

collections.title: Course preview: computational thinking
collections.description: The free online course "Computational Thinking" from MIT is a great way to learn about programming and problem solving. Here are some lectures from the course, you can find the full course on computationalthinking.mit.edu

collections.title: Visualisation
collections.description: Pluto is a great tool to visualise your results! Here are some examples.

collections.title: Machine learning
collections.description: Learn about using ML in Julia with these examples.

collections.title: Language
collections.description: Learn about working with natural language in Julia.

collections.title: Puzzles & Games
collections.description: Have fun with some recreational programming!

collections.title: Pluto and the Web
collections.description: Pluto is a fantastic tool for connecting Julia to the web! Learn more about using HTML, CSS and JavaScript in Pluto to take your visualization skills to the next level.
